counts.docs:
Raw measurement data from the sensor electronics (dimensionless quantity). Higher counts mean less moisture. May be used for material specific calibrations.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SMT100 Soil Moisture Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/smt100.html#configuration-variables)*

dielectric_constant.docs:
Dielectric coefficient or permittivity of the material to be measured (dimensionless quantity). Higher permittivity means higher water content. May be used for material specific calibration.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SMT100 Soil Moisture Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/smt100.html#configuration-variables)*

moisture.docs:
Soil moisture (volumetric water content in %).
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SMT100 Soil Moisture Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/smt100.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
Soil temperature in degrees Celsius. Please note that the temperature sensor is inside the black sensor enclosure and requires some time to equilibrate with the soil temperature.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SMT100 Soil Moisture Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/smt100.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) if you want to use multiple UART buses.

*See also: [SMT100 Soil Moisture Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/smt100.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to poll the sensor. Defaults is 60s.

*See also: [SMT100 Soil Moisture Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/smt100.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage.docs:
Supply voltage of the sensor in Volt.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SMT100 Soil Moisture Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/smt100.html#configuration-variables)*
